title: league tabbing out for no reason
body: this is so annoying, whenever im right clicking to move sometimes ill get tabbed out and it gets me killed, league is the only game this happens in and its really pissing me off, how can I fix it?

replies.body: That might be happening if something on your desktop is being selected somehow. A lot of players have been able to stop that from happening by deleting the desktop shortcut for League and pinning the shortcut to your taskbar instead. Try that out, and let me know if it stops League from randomly minimizing.

If that doesn't work there are few other things you can try.  I had this sort of issue not too long ago, sent in a support ticket, and got it sorted out.  

If the above mentioned step doesn't resolve the issue try a full repair.  If that doesn't work try deleting League's "config" folder completely.  For me, it turned out I actually needed to reinstall my graphics drivers to fix the problem.  Still an easy fix, just an odd one.  If none of these end up resolving your issue a Support ticket is your best bet.
